projects.title: my-restaurant
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to love front-end . I've learned many technologies and codes . Application show the menu for different type of food , name food and image for this food.

projects.title: Machine Learning
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for studing machine learining that optimizes and facilitation data handling with popular algorithms used by python like K-NN, ANN or DT algorithms. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: Horned Beast Card
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows beast card and you can choose card based number of horns have in beasd . This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
